attributes.action: Make mondays start at 10:30 for work and school.
attributes.additional_details: It will benefit people's mental health-more time to sleep, no rushing and stress, and time to eat breakfast (which also increases productivity). It will also give more calm time rather than stress with the family, increasing the bond.
attributes.background: If you do this, then it will give people time to adjust and wind down before the first day of the week, making their attitude to working better and increasing their productivity.

rejection.details:
The Government isn't responsible for when the working day starts - this is a matter for employers and employees - but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Change school starting time to 10am: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646296
